title: _DXGK_CHILD_DEVICE_HPD_AWARENESS (d3dkmdt.h)
description: The DXGK_CHILD_DEVICE_HPD_AWARENESS enumeration is used to describe the hot plug capabilities of a child device of a display adapter.
